surface_area: The total area of the surface of the mesh.
bbox_size: Dimensions of the bounding box enclosing the mesh.
bbox_aspect_ratios: Aspect ratios of the bounding box dimensions.
sa_to_bbox_volume_ratio: Ratio of surface area to volume of the bounding box.
eigenvalues: Eigenvalues from PCA decomposition of the mesh vertices.
eigenvalues_ratio: Ratios of PCA eigenvalues indicating shape characteristics.
first_to_second_axis_ratio: Ratio of the first to second principal axis lengths.
num_vertices: Total number of vertices in the mesh.
num_faces: Total number of faces in the mesh.
mean_curvature: Average curvature across the mesh surface.
std_curvature: Standard deviation of curvature across the mesh.
mean_edge_length: Average length of the edges in the mesh.
std_edge_length: Standard deviation of edge lengths in the mesh.
mean_face_area: Average area of the faces in the mesh.
std_face_area: Standard deviation of face areas in the mesh.
